WorkItem.Description: Running Convert-SQLServerInventoryClixmlToExcel.ps1 with a 1.2MB xml.qz file and I get this warning:  WARNING: Could not deserialize : Exception calling "Invoke" with "2" argument(s): "'.', hexadecimal value 0x00, is an invalid character. Line 1, position 252. WARNING: Could not deserialize : Exception calling "Invoke" with "2" argument(s): "Obj XML tag is not recognized." and it repeats infinitely until I stop the process.  It only happens when I try to process a file from one particular domain.
WorkItem.Summary: Obj XML tag is not recognized
